tooltip.cobgyms.poke_shard.tooltip: An ingredient used to craft %s Poké Caches.
tooltip.cobgyms.poke_fragments.tooltip: Combine four of these to make a %s Poké Shard.
cobgyms.lang.poke_cache_received: You Received a §b%s§r from the Poke Caché!
cobgyms.lang.poke_cache_received_shiny: You Received a §dShiny§r §b%s§r from the Poke Caché!
tooltip.cobgyms.gym_key.tooltip: Right-click with this to start a Gym Battle.
cobgyms.lang.command.non_player_command: This command is not supposed to be used by a player.
cobgyms.lang.command.which_cache.not_fou: "%s" not found in any cache loot tables.
cobgyms.lang.command.which_cache.base_ev: Base Evolution "%s" found in the following caches:
cobgyms.lang.message.no_response: No response from server please try again.
cobgyms.lang.message.cannot_inside_gym: This item cannot be used from inside a Gym.
cobgyms.lang.menu.leave.confirmation: Are you sure you want to leave the Gym?
cobgyms.lang.menu.leave.title: Leave the Gym?
cobgyms.lang.menu.start.title: Start Gym Battle
cobgyms.lang.menu.start.rewards: Higher levels are more likely to give better rewards
cobgyms.lang.menu.start.level_min: Gym Pokemon Level must be at least 5
cobgyms.lang.gym.first_time.part_two: - Beat all the trainers and the leader to be rewarded.
cobgyms.lang.gym.first_time.part_three: - If your pokemon all faint or you forfeit a battle then you will whiteout.
cobgyms.lang.gym.first_time.part_four: - You can leave at any time with the Gym Exit block near the entrance.
cobgyms.lang.gym.first_time.part_five: - You cannot break or place blocks except for torches.
